company_commercial_names: ei-12437 | formitable reservieren ei-12437-b | ei-12437 b
short_description: ei-12437 is a restaurant based in berlin, germany.
long_description: alexandra strödel and felix schlink are presenting an honest and product related cuisine, focussing on traditional food made from ingredients that have been around for a very long time. bread, cakes and pickles are made in-house, other ingredients are mainly sourced local and always organic. plattform 2020, erdhof seewalde, prignitzer landhof, forellenhof benecke, biomanufaktur havelland, pilz & baum, barnimer brauhaus, terra naturkosthandel, soma wines, weinhandlung edel & faul, weingut familie allendorf and many more.
business_tags: restaurant reservations | vegetarian diet | the beer garden | lunch & snacks | vegetarian dishes | traditional foods | book notes | dietary restrictions | bread and cakes | wine offers | walking shoes
generated_description: ei-12437, also known as eib, is a restaurant and beer garden located in berlin, germany. founded by jessica-joyce sidon and her team, the establishment collaborates with grün berlin to develop the spreepark artspace and spreepark development. eib combines traditional aesthetics and functions with contemporary sensibilities, focusing on sustainability and the preservation of historical monuments. the restaurant offers an honest and product-related cuisine, featuring traditional dishes made from long-standing ingredients, including vegetarian options. the beer garden provides seating on a terrace and is wheelchair accessible, accommodating larger groups with reservations.
